cause.description:
For any of us who can, as we can. To obey God's call through James to go forth and "take care of the widows and orphans."
1. Share the Gospel
2. Love those out there that need to know about God and His Love
3. Help where the needs are for HIS glory..
cause.mission: Assist in the faciliatation of help, and love to the children of the world who are poor/orphaned..
cause.name: Child Aid
